title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Presenter at the park's Archaeology Fair. The fair draws hundreds every year. NPS  A Growing Park Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park is a newer unit of the National Park Service. The park is growing and continues to develop its facilities and visitor services. The addition of the Resaca de la Palma Battlefield means services and programs will continue to grow in the coming years. Experience Your Park You have the chance to watch a Nation Park take shape. The park encourages visitors to come by the visitor center, talk to a Ranger, walk the trails, and take part in the development of this important site. The park is open daily from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Basic Information - Get to know Palo Alto Directions & Transportation - Find the best way to get here Things To Do - Find out what's going on at Palo Alto Calendar - Use our calendar to help plan your trip Safety - We want you to have a safe visit Accessibility - A park for all Nearby Attractions - Helpful info to help you plan your trip to Palo Alto  Â          Basic Information   A little planning goes a long way. Make the most of your visit and use this page to help you plan ahead.            Things To Do At Palo Alto   Palo Alto Battlefield offers a variety of experiences, events, and activities. Explore what YOUR park has to offer.        Directions to Palo Alto   Getting to the park can be a little tricky. Use this info to help you make your way to the park.
